Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 30th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1980...
Injured on 7/27/1981 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/24/1983 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/12/1984 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1985, off Billy Chappel (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1985, off Hugh Ly (SYR)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/9/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $451,400 per year...
